NHV in Pistoolhaven performs helicopter flights to transport ship pilots to ships off the coast of the Netherlands and Belgium.
The Helicopter Hoist Operator is responsible for the execution of the hoist operations mainly in offshore operations. This position works in a team of HHO, engineers and pilots and reports to the Base Manager.
Responsibilities include coordinating passenger and aircraft handling procedures, assisting with technical preparation of flights, and carrying out hoist duties in accordance with NHV procedures and the Flight Operations Manual.
Requirements include relevant hoisting/technical experience preferred, minimum 2 years experience, Medical class 2, English ICAO Level 4, and Dutch.
